reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price chair
reviews.reviewText: I recently turned a spare bedroom into an office and needed a nice chair to go with my new desk.After comparing several different chairs from retail stores and several on Amazon I decided to order this one.My decided factor was ultimately the price. I do not work from home and just use my office a few days a week, a couple hours at a time so I didn't need a $200+ chair. I didn't want the mesh back and I like the fact that this one has the arms and it is super padded and comfortable to be a smaller chair.As far as size, my husband who is almost 200lb, could sit in it comfortably. Anyone 200lb+ or on the taller side, this chair is probably not the best choice. I also can't say how comfortable it would be if you WFH and use it multiple hours a day.Overall, I am super happy with my purchase and the quality of the chair. I also want to add that putting it together was pretty easy. Leave the arms loose until you get the back on then tighten everything up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a chair that would fit in my small office. The chair isn't too big, which is what i wanted. This chair worked perfectly. It is comfortable and you can lean back to stretch. The assembly was easy and I don't feel tired after sitting in the chair for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for short periods
reviews.reviewText: This chair is a good bang for buck chair, easy to put together, and looks good. It is a great chair for sitting briefly but if like me, you need to sit for 8+ hours it does start to hurt (at least for me) due to the back being so low. There was also a small scratch on it when I received it but overall a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Excellent office chair! If you are looking for a great little office chair that is perfect and comfortable and is put together easily then is the one. Spins rotates and glides seamlessly. I also ordered a carpet protector in plastic to put this on in my home office. Definitely buy this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable and Great Value
reviews.reviewText: This is a great chair for the price. It’s very comfortable. I’m a teacher and I’m up and down from the seat constantly throughout the day, but even days I’m sitting longer I’ve never had any lower back or butt discomfort. I’ve had it for half the school year now. Very pleased with this chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a chair worth keeping for me 2.75 stars
reviews.reviewText: I will say up front that I am not a mechanically inclined person. I am more of the IT, logical type, so take that into account.I found this to be frustrating to put together. You open the paper that came with it and they give you a lay out of the items included in the box, tell you how to care for the chair and such. No instructions on how to assemble, it immediately goes into other languages, I assume for the same information that was provided on the first page. So, I started my best to assemble as it looks fairly easy. I got to one step that I was having trouble with and in frustration happened to pick up the little book from the back. There were the instructions.What logic tells you to burry the instructions 10 pages deep after covering useless information in a 1/2 dozen different languages. The like all these kinds of products, there wasn't really any directions just images and you are left to try and pick out what the writer means. I guess it was too complicated to write directions. How about this - if you are too lazy to write out detail directions to go along with your images, at least include a URL, Qcode to a video that shows the customer someone assembling it.All that said, I was able to assemble the char in about 20 minutes, sat in it for a bit and found it to be uncomfortable. I am maybe 5'6 ant 200 pounds, this chair fit really well on the seat part but came up to below my shoulder blades. This caused the bone to rub on the top of the chair.Additionally, the predrilled holes didn't 100% align, so precision and design were gaps when it comes to this product.Product returned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great home office chair FOR THE PRICE POINT!!!
reviews.reviewText: This office chair is a great product FOR THE PRICE POINT!!! If you're over 6 feet tall or 250 pounds or both this is NOT the chair for you. Also, if you're used to very expensive, professional, office furniture at your workplace, this is NOT the chair for you. I didn't want to spend over $100 for a reasonably comfortable home office chair and this product fit the bill perfectly.Several reviewers have remarked that the assembly process was not the easiest. I used the tools pictured in the attached photo and it was fairly straight forward with a clear & easy to follow instruction manual. Overall (to include unboxing), the entire process took me about 30 minutes. If I had only used the Allen wrench provided to assemble the chair, the process would been somewhat more challenging and time consuming.Additionally, some reviewers have commented that sitting in this chair for more than 2 or 3 hours at a time is uncomfortable. Well, I have a $1,000, ergonomic chair at work and that's also uncomfortable after sitting in it for 2 or 3 hours. So for frequent home office work less than 45 minutes at a time, this chair is great. For serious, full time, work-from-home 8 hours a day, you'll have to spend a lot more to be comfortable.FOLLOW UP: After about 10 months of almost daily use my original comments above remain the same. The chair is still in great shape and working well for less than an hour at a time. Wheels aren't the best even on a tiled surface, but if that's what I wanted, I would have spent a lot more money. Still very happy with this purchase.
Very comfortable and nice. I love the material of the chair. I can sit on it for hours and is still very comfortable.
la silla es bonita fácil de armar y cómoda solo que para largas jornadas de juego si te termina lastimando
Surprisingly good! Well finished, wide. Value for money.

Ordered this for work from home after going through the numerous good reviews and boy! This chair is every bit worthy of all the good reviews. Reviewing it after using for a month.MaterialLeatherette cover over soft cushionSturdy plastic base and wheels (I wanted a steel one for more strength, but this is quite good to be honest)Wheels are very good quality and roll effortlesslyPadded arm rest for comfortDesignVery comfortable and spacious seating size wise (my husband with a bulky frame fits in comfortably on the chair) Arm rest is fixed and height cant be adjusted but it's fixed at a great comfortable heightCan carry heavy weight more than what is mentioned in the description, tested upto 114 kgs and the chair doesn't creak.It's a mid back chair, for me the back rest reaches a little below the shoulders when sitting upright. I am 5'9" tall. The back is upright but not to an extent where it gets uncomfortable while splitting straight and working.Amazingly light weight. Have another chair from the brand featherlite purchased from a dealer in the same price range. This one hands down beats the featherlite chair.Super easy to assemble on your own, comes with instructions to assemble.All adjustments levers available for adjusting tilt and heightGo for it without any 2nd thought. Best product at this price range

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente silla, duradera y muy cómoda! (Opinión actualizada)
reviews.reviewText: **ACTUALIZACIÓN- 15 DE DICIEMBRE 2018**Que otra cosa puedo decir acerca de la silla, ha durado a pesar del uso diario que se le da. El cojinete no ha perdido su forma y la silla se ha mantenido firme sin aflojarse ni nada de eso. Comenzó con unos ligeros rechinidos pero eso se debe a que la zona donde se encuentra la silla hay mucho polvo así que le tuve que dar una pequeña limpiada y lubricada y quedó muy bien. Se sigue reclinando bien y sigue igual de cómoda a pesar que se han sentado personas desde 50 a 100 kilos jeje.**ACTUALIZACIÓN-7 DE ABRIL 2018**Después de casi 3 meses de uso la silla sigue funcionando como nueva. Recibe bastante uso día tras día y el respaldo/asiento de la silla han mantenido su forma y sigue igual de cómoda.El único detalle es que las tapitas de los tornillos se comenzarán a salir por si solos con el tiempo, adjunto fotos para que vean las tapitas. En el caso de muchos pues se les podría aplicar un poquito de silicón para que fijen bien pero sin quedarse super pagadas (no recomendaría el uso de Kola Loka) Yo en lo personal le pondré solo lo suficiente para que no se zafen pero no tanto como para que se quede super pegado y las pueda retirar en caso de ser necesario. Este detalle no afecta el funcionamiento de la silla para nada, es meramente un detalle estético y por lo cual no le quitaré estrellas a mi evaluación. He revisado si los tornillos siguen apretados y a pesar del uso que se le da a la silla siguen bien y fijos. El mecanismo hidráulico para bajar y subir la silla no se utiliza tanto así que sigue funcionando a la perfección, la sigo recomendando :)**RESEÑA ORIGINAL**Le regalé esta silla a mi mamá para que tenga mayor comodidad en su negocio y le gustó muchísimo. Comparto mi reseña para todo aquel interesado en el producto. Espero y le sirva de algo a alguien. Saludos!La silla viene en una caja con todas las piezas necesarias para armarla. el instructivo viene en español, francés e inglés.Para ser sincero están escritas de tal manera que cualquier persona podrá armarla ya que viene muy bien explicado todo y con las herramientas necesarias para armarla. Yo me tardé unos 10 minutos en armarla y quedó muy bien.Las rueditas giran bien y no tienen mayor fricción en el piso de porcelanato del negocio de mi mamá. No les sabría decir que tan bien rodaría en una alfombra pero creo que siempre y cuando no esté muy gruesa rodará bien.El material se de piel suave, aunque es un poco delgada y se siente frágil con buen cuidado que se le dé (como todo producto) durará buen tiempo funcionando y luciendo como debe de ser.La altura total del asiento al momento de extenderla hasta su punto máximo es de unos 55 centímetros, altura estándar.Me gustó que también es posible ajustarla para que se pueda reclinar un tanto sin perder su estabilidad.La única observación que hago es que cuando se esté armando tomen precaución de no sobre apretar los tornillos ya que estos se pueden barrer. En cuanto sientan que topen ya no le aprieten más jeje.Fuera de eso no tengo ninguna queja. A mi mamá le encantó. Saludos!
